Author: xxxredvel
Text: LMFAO but in all serious YES, that romaine alibi is perfect!

Author: odsp123
Text: If you have recently lost a lot of weight, and people have noticed, then ugghhh she probably had an idea it was purging. Just because that seems to be everyone's thoughts with fast weight loss, even without throwing up. People are so cynical. Anyway, I would feel mortified too. I think it's safe to say, we've all had moments where someone "knew" or found out. It fucking sucks. Maybe just pretend to be sick today and tomorrow? Say it's like, a bad smoothie you had, OH! SAY IT WAS ROMAINE!
